headline: Application period for TechCred set to begin March 1
sentences: "As a result, we want to help Ohio’s job creators plan ahead, so we are announcing an official application schedule for the rest of 2022 that will help businesses maximize TechCred and better compete in today’s tech-infused economy," he said in a statement.
Since the program launched in October 2019, a total of 1,615 Ohio employers have been approved for TechCred, which will fund up to 32,269 tech-focused credentials to upskill Ohio workers.
Governor Jon Husted said that “TechCred has become part of the job training fabric of Ohio as many companies apply to use the program regularly."
The results of the 12th round, which closed on Jan. 31, will be announced in the coming weeks.
The 13th application period for TechCred will open on March 1 and close on March 31.
Husted serves as director of the Governor’s Office of Workforce Transformation.
